briefTitle: Community Services Navigation to Advance Health Equity in Breast Cancer Screening
officialTitle: Community Services Navigation to Advance Health Equity in Breast Cancer Screening
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Change in participants' level of social needs as measured by the B-SINCERE (Breast-Screener for Intensifying Community Referrals for Health) screener
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* English and Spanish speakers
* Received an abnormal result of a screening mammogram
* Self-reports at least one social need on the B-SINCERE Screener

Exclusion Criteria:

-Prior diagnosis of breast cancer
